name: A Squirrel Game
description:
The Squirrel must retrieve his acorns to feed his family during hibernation, he has to navigate through the maze filled with angry grey squirrels that are after the acorns as well. Help the squirrel retrieve his acorn and escape the maze.

Created by: Dylan Markey Jordan Harris, Oran Mcgivern and Seana Mackin

Team name - JD Sports
